summary: A documentary that utilizes hundreds of hours of audio that Marlon Brando recorded over the course of his life to tell the screen legend's story.
cast: Marlon Brando|Stella Adler|Bernardo Bertolucci|Michael Borne|Marlon Brando Sr.|Christian Brando|Dick Cavett|Connie Chung|Montgomery Clift|Francis Ford Coppola|Bette Davis|Joel Grey|Anna Kashfi|Elia Kazan|Robert F. Kennedy|Martin Luther King|Sacheen Littlefeather|Dorothy Malone|Rocky Marciano|Kevin McCarthy|Roger Moore|Edward R. Murrow|Richard Nixon|Burt Reynolds|Konstantin Stanislavski|Ed Sullivan|Tarita|Galina Ulanova|Liv Ullmann|Jersey Joe Walcott|Esther Williams
title: Listen to Me Marlon
